website_summaries.verdict: The original perm by Ogilvie that's a good choice for customers with healthy hair who want lasting curls and waves. The included conditioners are welcome bonuses.
pros: This top-selling perm is made by a trusted brand and produces long-lasting results

cons: Can be somewhat harsh on delicate, damaged, or color-treated hair

product_meta.description: Formula provides gentle, effective salon results at home! Trust the haircare experts at Ogilvie for a complete conditioning formula that helps safeguard your hair from dryness and frizz while ensuring lasting shine and curls. The B4 Pre-Perm Conditioner gently prepares your hair for a natural-looking perm. Restorative after-perm conditioners help balance your hair's moisture level for silkier hair and manageable curls that last.
